posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

09/20/21 - 10/03/21
Issue - V71
Current Release: 1.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • Check out the Streamlit sharing badge for your GitHub repos:
  • Try the new experimental cache primitives st.experimental_memo and st.experimental_singleton to help cache your data faster!
  • Streamlit 1.0 has landed! Read more here and check out our new roadmap app to see what’s coming next.

Featured Content

  • Is it Possible to Add a Navigation Bar to Streamlit Apps? | Streamlit #29 @dataprofessor
  • PvP Gomoku game in Streamlit! @TeddyHuang-00
  • Control the Flow: Streamlit
  • Building a buzzing stocks news feed using NLP and Streamlit | Named Entity Recognition & Linking
  • SciLit @AvratanuBiswas
  • iRaPCA clustering

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Hide Menu & Customize The Footer in Streamlit Apps @Jesse_JCharis
  • How to Customize Streamlit Hamburger Menu Items About Us Tutorial @1littlecoder
  • How to build a Cryptocurrency Price App in Python using Binance API | Streamlit #28 @dataprofessor
  • YOLOR + DeepSORT + StreamLit Computer Vision Dashboard

  • Deploy a Public Streamlit Web App for Free — Here’s How
  • Make printable annotations on PDF with streamlit and fitz.
  • Basic Dashboard using Streamlit and Matplotlib

  • LUDe: LIDeB’s Useful Decoys

  • DocTR: Document Text Recognition

Data Visualization

CV and Images

Geography and Society

General

  • Simple Password Generator @MaxMnemo

Model Building and Training

  • Semi Automation Model

Cool happenings and other things

  • New Component: st-card for displaying KPI metrics in your apps @akshanshkmr
  • New Component: 20+ Animated loaders, updated navbar and more from Hydralit Components @Probability
  • Toggle buttons component using static HTML/JS. No React or extra server needed @asehmi
  • Streamlit, Convierte tus Datos en Aplicaciones Upcoming workshop 10/13
  • openSim Symposium 2021: Telling stories with pictures 10/22
  • “Создаем интерактивное веб-приложение на Python с помощью Streamlit” - Online лекция в Смарте Upcoming class 10/26

Follow us
